title: E-commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution with product listings, shopping cart, and checkout functionality. This project emphasizes secure payment processing and a responsive user interface across various devices. It also includes an admin panel for product management and order fulfillment.

title: Task Management App
description: A simple yet powerful task management application designed for personal and team productivity. Features include task creation, categorization, due dates, and user collaboration. The backend is built with a RESTful API, and the frontend provides an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

title: Portfolio Website V1
description: The first iteration of my personal portfolio website, showcasing early projects and skills. This version focused on fundamental web development concepts and responsive design. It served as a learning experience for modern web technologies.

title: Recipe Finder
description: An application that allows users to search for recipes based on ingredients and dietary preferences. It integrates with a third-party API to fetch recipe data and displays them in an easy-to-read format. Users can save their favorite recipes and create meal plans.
